summary: A man who escorts wealthy widows in New York's Upper East Side takes a young aspiring playwright under his wing.
cast: Paul Dano|Marian Seldes|Celia Weston|Patti D'Arbanville|John C. Reilly|Dan Hedaya|Kevin Kline|Jason Butler Harner|Alex Burns|Katie Holmes|Alicia Goranson|Lynn Cohen|John Pankow|Lewis Payton Jr.|Marisa Ryan|Elizabeth Blancke-Biggs|Victoria Barabas|John Leighton|Lauren Weisman|Beth Fowler|Lisa Brescia|Graeme Malcolm|Jackie Hoffman|Rafael Sardina|Betty Hudson|Jean Brassard|Justis Bolding|Peter Kybart|Jonathan Ames|Gisele Alicea|Philip Carlson|David Boston|Barbara Christie|Marshall Factora|Ed Kalegi|Elisa London|Lewis Payton|George Peck|Jay Santiago|Kevin Scullin|Solena Sulin|Bill Walters|Todd Travis Warrick
director: Directors: Shari Springer Berman, Robert Pulcini
title: The Extra Man
